title: Soledad O’Brien and friend remind us we should never be shy about calling Trump supporters ‘total trash’
text:
Who knows how many people Hillary Clinton inspired to get out and vote for Donald Trump by calling his supporters “baskets of deplorables”? She certainly didn’t win any over to her side.

Of course, no one’s shy about attributing to Trump’s supporters every evil they see in him; to them, Trump is without question a white supremacist, and that makes anyone who supports him a white supremacist.

Kurt Schlichter, columnist over at Twitchy sister-site Townhall, often reminds conservatives on Twitter that liberals hate them, and some blue checks, including Soledad O’Brien, made that perfectly clear.

He’s a racist and a bigot and these people behind him are trash. https://t.co/2dYurCaR0e — Soledad O'Brien (@soledadobrien) October 11, 2019

Total Trash! We shouldn’t ever be shy about calling them what they are. I liked this shot of the troll that we’ve all heard from. pic.twitter.com/cPL6ieAErq — Gailen David (@gailendavid) October 11, 2019

They all look the same like some other category of primate. — Andrew McFadden (@rbduval77) October 11, 2019

His rallies are sold out circuses where the audience is the freak show. — Gailen David (@gailendavid) October 11, 2019

Nazi youth, hypnotized at a rally for a failing tv star. White nationalism stars in their eyes. Trump rallies remind me of Leni Riefenstahl films. #FridayFeeling pic.twitter.com/F0JH8t9G1n — Barbara Malmet (@B52Malmet) October 11, 2019

Over 100 likes for a Democrat who just said this. https://t.co/EonXOzRMlC — While Supplies Last (@corrcomm) October 12, 2019

You realize there are people in both parties that look like that… — Chris Borne (@ChrisBorne3) October 12, 2019

They say "love trumps hate", but they *do* this ^^^ — Zotzer (@zotzer) October 12, 2019

Yep. They ARE the people they have hated the past 3 years. Just about everything they have criticized Republicans for they do them on regular basis. The lack of self awareness is humorous to me though — Card March is 2 hrs 30 mins before games!!! (@CardsnDerby) October 12, 2019

@soledadobrien calling people with a different political viewpoint racist trash, while failing to recognize her very own bigotry. It's why Trump won and why she will be singing this off key melody for 4 more years. https://t.co/a1PIdIObKm — BayAreaFrau (@bayareahausfrau) October 12, 2019

She is arguably the most racist person on Twitter, ironic that she cries racism with every other tweet. — Kevin Doney (@doneykevin1) October 12, 2019

Yeah, @soledadobrien just makes me depressed. Her arrogance & hubris & inability into seeing the humanity in her fellow Americans – who voted for Obama in 2008 & 2012 – by the way – is unfathomable. She's going to get Trump supporters hurt or killed with her indignation. — RebeccaThrockmorton (@RebeccaThrockm9) October 12, 2019

These kinds of remarks show a basic bias and disrespect for the American people. ☕ — Michele Duffy (@MicheleDuffy18) October 12, 2019

Keep reminding me why I'll never vote liberal or democrat.

Thank you for posting. — ISMV Star Fortress trapped in the 21st century (@StarFortress) October 12, 2019

There are plenty of overweight, unattractive Democrats. Ain’t nobody got any business talking about someone else’s appearance. This is ugly, below the belt, and simply wrong. We need to be better than this. — Bruce Channell (@bruce_channell) October 12, 2019

Agree. This leads nowhere good. — Velveteen Yabbit (@VYabbit) October 12, 2019

Dehumanizing the other side. That's a Nazi tactic. — northclickboy (@chadwhitfield5) October 12, 2019

Is this the anti-bigotry thread? It's hard to tell… — McKay Smith (@_mckay_smith) October 12, 2019

They’re doing their part to get Trump’s base out to the polls, and maybe some fed-up independents too.

Liberals hate you. I keep telling you. THEY keep telling you. You need to listen. And you need to prepare. https://t.co/fP4ks68TRI — Kurt Schlichter (@KurtSchlichter) October 12, 2019
